title: Front End Mobile Engineer
text: Built an internal customer support app with Material UI, React, Axios, Apollo, and GraphQL. Answered 40+ technical tickets a day to solve customer issues. Contributed to app design 10+ times at weekly UX (User Experience) meetings.

title: Front End Web Engineer
text: Fixed 50+ bugs with CSS, JavaScript, ReactJS. Lead 3+ meetings with 2-5 coworkers. Prepared 5+ designs for complex bug fix meetings with other developers. Tested with Firefox, Chrome, Safari, Internet Explorer 11 with VirtualBox, and mobile.

title: Full Stack WordPress Engineer
text: Developed 5+ WordPress/WooCommerce sites with Beaver Builder page builder and CSS. Modified 10+ websites with HTML, PHP, CSS, JavaScript, and jQuery to comply with requests. Used WordPress hooks, plugins, PHP, and JavaScript to enhance User Experience. Wrote 10+ detailed progress reports on new feature implementation. Transferred 20+ domain names between HostGator, BlueHost, 1&1, and GoDaddy.
